name: This House Looks Familiar
description:
This House Looks Familiar is a completly normal 3D exploration Game in which you will only have to pick up a key and open a door to finish the game.

Controls:

  • Use WASD to move.
  • Use Mouse to look around
  • "E" to interact witch objects and
  • Press ESC to open the Developer Console (Only in case of crash)
  • ...
  • I can't remember if there are more

This game was inspired by the caretaker "Everywhere at the end of time" Albums. It explores a representation of dementia.

May the ballroom be eternal...

It can only be played once, if you want to play it again press F12 when you have opened the game and then restart it.

Textures by: https://3dtextures.me/

Our Team

Programer - Diego García Ricaño @diegogary253D Artist - César García Ricaño @gary_creates
